Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running with delays near Garfield due to an earlier track problem.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running with delays near Garfield due to an earlier track problem.

Shuttle buses are available between Garfield ant 95th.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.
